fi.tuni.mentalsurvival

Class GameUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tuni.mentalsurvival.GameUtil

  • public class GameUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Game utility class that contains methods for different actions in game (creating the world. transforming tiled map's layers to bodies, saving and loading the game etc.)

      GameUtil()

                                    com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world)
        Create any kind of static body to our box2d world.
        Parameters:
        rect - the rectangle which the body is made from (contains x, y, width, height)
        userData - the type of the created body
        world - world object

                                  com.google.gson.JsonArray positionsArray)
        Clear bodies that were removed earlier (this method is used when loading the game from save)
        Parameters:
        game - tha game object
        bodies - array of all the bodies on the box2d world
        positionsArray - the positions that has bodies we need to remove
